newsitem.title: USA: Corporate Vision signs CD-ROM pact.
newsitem.headline: Corporate Vision signs CD-ROM pact.

text.p: Corporate Vision Inc said Tuesday it signed an agreement with T.D. Williamson Inc to produce an interactive marketing CD-ROM to introduce a new Williamson product line.
The company said the CD-ROM will focus on Williamson's line of Centrefuse Butt Fusion products for the petroleum, natural gas, water and mining industries.
Corporate Vision develops multimedia presentation products for clients to use in their training and marketing programs.
